Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Adoration Ministry Enugu
Ụka Katọlịk na Dayosis Enugwu anapụla Fada Ejike Mbaka 'Adoration Ministry' o hibere tinye ya n'okpuru dayọsis.
A machikwara ya itinye ọnụ n'okwu metụtara ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị.
Father Mbaka: Bishop Onaga enyela ndị ụka Katọlik n'Enugu ọpịpịa abalị asaa maka ime ngagharịiwe
Ihe ndị ị maghị maka ndụ Father Ejike Mbaka n'okorobịa
Ihe mere Rev Fr Ejike Mbaka ji mechie 'Adoration Ministry' ruo otu ọnwa
Nke a na-abịa ka ọ nọchara  nkwụsị ọrụ nke Bishop dayosis ahụ bụ Calistus Onaga kwụsiburu ya abalị 30 maka mee 'ekpere" ọpịpa nakwa ntụgharịuche'.

N'ozi nke nnukwu ụkọchukwu na-elekọta dayọsis ahụ bụ Bishọpụ  Calistus Onaga zigara Mbaka, n'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Juun, ọ sịrị,  "Adoration Ministry Enugu ga-abụzị 'Chaplaincy' nke ga-anọ n'okpuru Dayọsịs Enugwu nke Fada Mbaka ga-abụ onye ndu ya."
Father Ejike Mbaka na ihe ndị ị maghị maka ya
Dịka ọnụ na-ekwuru dayosis ahụ bụ Fada Benjamin Achi siri kọwaa, "A ga-ebidokwa kuziwe nkuzi katikizim dịka ndị Katọlik na-akụzị."
"Ọ gaghị anọzi dịka ministri dịka ọ dị na-mbụ, a ga-enwezi  a kpọrọ "chaplaincy council bụ ndị isi ga na-ahazi ihe a na-eme."
"Onye ọbụla na abụghị Katolik agaghị enwe ọkwa pụtara ihe n'a chaplaincy."
Ebe foto si, Enugu Catholic Diocese
Fada Achi kọwara na Fada Mbaka ka ga-abụ 'Chaplain' nke 'chaplaincy'  ahụ mana  a ga-etinyere ya ndị ụkọchukwu ndị ọzọ ya na ya ga na-arụkọ ọrụ.
Ebe foto si, Enugu Catholic Diocese
